alerts.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this module?

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introduction: Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how CARITAS HopeLine collects, uses, and protects your information.

collection.title: Information Collection
collection.description: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as your name, phone number, and location when you register or request assistance.

usage.title: How We Use Information
usage.description: Information is used to coordinate emergency response, allocate transit spaces in IDP camps, and improve our humanitarian services.

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.description: We share your data only with authorized emergency responders, site managers, and humanitarian partners involved in your assistance.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.description: You have the right to access, correct, or request the deletion of your personal data at any time through your profile settings.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have questions about this policy, please contact our support team through the live chat or emergency channels.

privacy.consent: By using HopeLine, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy and our commitment to protecting your data during humanitarian crises.

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.subtitle: Request account and data deletion
deleteAccount.warning: Warning: This action is permanent. Once your account is deleted, all your data, including history, records, and settings, will be permanently removed and cannot be recovered.
deleteAccount.reasonPlaceholder: Please tell us why you want to delete your account...
deleteAccount.confirmCheckbox: I understand that this action is irreversible and all my data will be lost.
deleteAccount.successMessage: Your request for account and data deletion has been received. Our team will process it within 30 days in accordance with our privacy policy.
deleteAccount.errorMessage: There was an error submitting your request. Please try again later or contact support directly.

findShelter.title: Find IDP Camps & Emergency Shelters
findShelter.subtitle: Locate official IDP camps and shelters in Bayelsa and Adamawa with available space and services.
findShelter.searchPlaceholder: Search by camp name, organization, or state...
findShelter.clickToFind: Click the button above to find your location.

findShelter.locationNeededDesc: Please click 'Use Current Location' first to get directions.
findShelter.geolocationNotSupportedDesc: Your browser does not support geolocation.

sos.title: Emergency SOS
sos.subtitle: Send an immediate emergency alert to CARITAS Nigeria, the Police, and local response teams.
sos.clickToInstruction: Click the button below to send an instant SOS with your location.
sos.emergencyTypeSelect: Select the emergency type to help response teams prepare appropriate assistance
sos.additionalInfoDesc: Provide any extra details to help responders understand your situation
sos.additionalInfoPlaceholder: E.g., Number of people affected, specific medical needs, landmark for location...
sos.locationDesc: We need your coordinates to send responders
sos.locationAccessRequiredDesc: Please allow location access to automatically detect your position. Check your browser address bar or system settings.
sos.troubleshootDesc: If you are seeing 'kCLErrorLocationUnknown' or persistent location errors:
sos.troubleshootStep1_1: Go to System Settings ‚Üí Privacy & Security ‚Üí Location Services.
sos.troubleshootStep1_3: Ensure Google Chrome is toggled ON.
sos.troubleshootStep2Desc: Toggling Wi-Fi off and on can sometimes force a location refresh.
sos.troubleshootStep3Desc: If GPS persists in failing, please use the 'Enter Location Manually' option to ensure responders can find you.
sos.specificAddressPlaceholder: Please provide detailed description of your current location to help responders find you.
sos.ussdCodesNotAvailable: USSD codes not available for your location.
sos.nextStep1: Your alert is sent to CARITAS and local emergency responders.
sos.nextStep2: Our support team will try to contact you immediately.
sos.nextStep3: Responders are dispatched to your GPS location.
sos.nextStep4: Please keep your phone line open and stay in a safe place.
sos.locationPermissionDenied: Location access denied. Please enable location permissions.
sos.locationRequiredDesc: Please allow location access or enter manually to send SOS.
sos.detailsRequiredDesc: Please provide state and address for manual location.
sos.sosSentDesc: Responders have been notified of your situation.
sos.sosFailedDesc: Could not send SOS alert. Please try the USSD codes.
